function.name: str_replace_editor

args.old_str: ### TODO: compute and combine hyperbolic clustering and centripetal losses here
args.new_str:
# Compute hyperbolic clustering loss
        clustering_loss_fn = HyperbolicClusteringLoss(self.manifold, self.cluster_loss_margin)
        cluster_loss = clustering_loss_fn(rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative)

        # Compute hyperbolic centripetal loss
        centripetal_loss_fn = HyperbolicCentripetalLoss(self.manifold, self.centri_loss_margin)
        centri_loss = centripetal_loss_fn(rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative)

        # Combine the losses with respective weights
        combined_loss = self.cluster_weight * cluster_loss + self.centri_weight * centri_loss
